events.message: Customer has filed a claim following a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection late yesterday evening.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' to ensure proper handling by the automotive claims team.
An agent was assigned to the case to manage communication and guide the customer through the claim process.
Acknowledgment of claim receipt was sent to the customer, confirming that the report has been accepted and logged.
Request sent to customer for necessary documents including vehicle registration, driver license, and police report related to the accident.
Customer uploaded all required documents promptly, including photos of vehicle damage and official accident report from authorities.
Investigation began to assess the circumstances and extent of damage from the reported auto accident.
Investigation completed with confirmation that damages and liability are consistent with the customer’s accident description.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer, covering vehicle repairs and associated costs.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the responsiveness of the claims process.
The claim was formally approved by management, authorizing disbursement of settlement funds to the customer.
Payment for the agreed-upon settlement amount was issued electronically to the customer’s designated bank account.
The claim was closed after confirmation of payment receipt and completion of all required administrative procedures.
All claim documents and records were archived securely for future reference and compliance with company policies.
